View Javadoc
1   package com.mamezou.rms.external.webapi;
2   
3   import java.time.LocalDateTime;
4   import java.util.Map;
5   import java.util.Set;
6   
7   import javax.enterprise.context.ApplicationScoped;
8   import javax.ws.rs.core.Application;
9   
10  import org.eclipse.microprofile.openapi.annotations.Components;
11  import org.eclipse.microprofile.openapi.annotations.OpenAPIDefinition;
12  import org.eclipse.microprofile.openapi.annotations.headers.Header;
13  import org.eclipse.microprofile.openapi.annotations.info.Contact;
14  import org.eclipse.microprofile.openapi.annotations.info.Info;
15  import org.eclipse.microprofile.openapi.annotations.media.Content;
16  import org.eclipse.microprofile.openapi.annotations.media.Schema;
17  import org.eclipse.microprofile.openapi.annotations.responses.APIResponse;
18  
19  import com.mamezou.rms.external.webapi.jwt.LoginUserRequestFilter;
20  import com.mamezou.rms.external.webapi.mapper.GenericErrorInfo;
21  import com.mamezou.rms.external.webapi.mapper.ServerExceptionMapperFeature;
22  import com.mamezou.rms.external.webapi.mapper.ValidationErrorInfo;
23  import com.mamezou.rms.platform.jwt.filter.JwtSecurityFilterFeature;
24  import com.mamezou.rms.platform.log.ServerHeaderDumpFilter;
25  import com.mamezou.rms.platform.provider.converter.RmsTypeParameterFeature;
26  import com.mamezou.rms.platform.role.RoleSecurityDynamicFeature;
27  
28  /**
29   * RESTアプリケーションのコンフィグ情報。
30   * REST API全体に関することをOpenAPIのアノテーションで定義している。
31   */
32  @OpenAPIDefinition(
33          info = @Info(title = "レンタル予約システムの公開API", version = "0.0.1-SNAPSHOT",
34              contact = @Contact(name = "豆ちゃん", url = "https://www.mamezou.com")),
35          components = @Components(
36                  schemas = {
37                      @Schema(
38                              name = "localDateTime",
39                              description = "日時型",
40                              format = "yyyyMMdd HH:mm",
41                              example = "20210314 09:00",
42                              implementation = LocalDateTime.class
43                              )
44                  },
45                  responses = {
46                      @APIResponse(
47                              name = "NotFound",
48                              responseCode = "404",
49                              description = "該当データがない場合",
50                              headers = @Header(name = "Rms-Exception", description = "発生例外のBusinessFlowExceptionが設定される", required = true,
51                                  schema = @Schema(implementation = String.class)),
52                              content = @Content(mediaType = "application/json",
53                                      schema = @Schema(implementation = GenericErrorInfo.class))
54                              ),
55                      @APIResponse(
56                              name = "ServerError",
57                              responseCode = "500",
58                              description = "アプリケーション内部でエラーが発生した場合",
59                              headers = @Header(name = "Rms-Exception", description = "発生例外のRmsSystemExceptionが設定される", required = true,
60                                  schema = @Schema(implementation = String.class)),
61                              content = @Content(mediaType = "application/json",
62                                  schema = @Schema(implementation = GenericErrorInfo.class))
63                              ),
64                      @APIResponse(
65                              name = "Forbidden",
66                              responseCode = "403",
67                              description = "対象データに対する操作権限がない場合",
68                              headers = @Header(name = "Rms-Exception", description = "発生例外のBusinessFlowExceptionが設定される", required = true,
69                                  schema = @Schema(implementation = String.class)),
70                              content = @Content(mediaType = "application/json",
71                              schema = @Schema(implementation = GenericErrorInfo.class))
72                              ),
73                      @APIResponse(
74                              name = "UnknownData",
75                              responseCode = "404",
76                              description = "処理対象データが存在しない場合",
77                              headers = @Header(name = "Rms-Exception", description = "発生例外のBusinessFlowExceptionが設定される", required = true,
78                                  schema = @Schema(implementation = String.class)),
79                              content = @Content(mediaType = "application/json",
80                              schema = @Schema(implementation = GenericErrorInfo.class))
81                              ),
82                      @APIResponse(
83                              name = "DataDupricate",
84                              responseCode = "409",
85                              description = "登録データが既に登録されている",
86                              headers = @Header(name = "Rms-Exception", description = "発生例外のBusinessFlowExceptionが設定される", required = true,
87                                  schema = @Schema(implementation = String.class)),
88                              content = @Content(mediaType = "application/json",
89                              schema = @Schema(implementation = GenericErrorInfo.class))
90                              ),
91                      @APIResponse(
92                              name = "ParameterError",
93                              responseCode = "400",
94                              description = "パラメータエラーの場合",
95                              headers = @Header(name = "Rms-Exception", description = "発生例外のConstraintViolationExceptionが設定される", required = true,
96                                  schema = @Schema(implementation = String.class)),
97                              content = @Content(mediaType = "application/json",
98                              schema = @Schema(implementation = ValidationErrorInfo.class))
99                              )
100                 })
101         )
102 @ApplicationScoped
103 public class ApplicationConfig extends Application {
104 
105     @Override
106     public Set<Class<?>> getClasses() {
107         return Set.of(
108                     RentalReservationResource.class,
109                     ManagementResource.class,
110                     RmsTypeParameterFeature.class,
111                     ServerExceptionMapperFeature.class,
112                     JwtSecurityFilterFeature.class,
113                     RoleSecurityDynamicFeature.class,
114                     LoginUserRequestFilter.class,
115                     ServerHeaderDumpFilter.class
116                 );
117     }
118 
119     @Override
120     public Map<String, Object> getProperties() {
121         return Map.of(
122                     // The following keys are defined in `ServerProperties.BV_SEND_ERROR_IN_RESPONSE`
123                     "jersey.config.beanValidation.disable.server", true  // jerseyのJAX-RSのBeanValidationサポートをOFFにする
124                 );
125     }
126 }
